body.title: Project description
body.text:
During my 4th year in Dublin, I worked as a freelance on a two-day-a-week schedule for the company Neolink.

My main mission was to carry out a complete overhaul of a first version of an agenda for the NeoGestion product using FullCalendar. To develop this agenda in an agile way, I collaborated with a designer and a project manager who was in direct contact with the client.

The main challenge of this project was to have the most optimized agenda possible for scheduling appointments, easy and quick event management. It was also necessary to develop an algorithm to facilitate the scheduling of appointments.

body.title: Main features of this Agenda
body.text:
• Have an excellent UI,UX to manipulate the agenda: Drag and drop / Multiple calendar views / Distinctive colors with filter system
  • Be able to take several appointments at the same time with the possibility to add a frequency and modify each appointment independently.
  • Have a configurable notification system for appointments
  • Be able to configure a 'Typical Week' (working hours) and availability periods as well as personal punctual or recurring events.
  • Be able to overlap several user schedules to have an intuitive visual of available / possible / occupied periods to choose the best appointment time
  • Develop an algorithm to propose appointment scheduling based on availability and participants
  • Have information on mouse-over an event on the agenda
  • Be able to consult and modify an event in a pop-up on click on the agenda
